TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IQueryProvider

summary.span: Defines methods to create and execute queries that are described by an object.

span.span: Defines methods to create and execute queries that are described by an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il interfaccia è destinata all'implementazione dei provider di query.The interface is intended for implementation by query providers. Per ulteriori informazioni su come creare un provider LINQ, vedere [LINQ: Building an IQueryable Provider](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=112370) in MSDN Blogs.For more information about how to create your own LINQ provider, see [LINQ: Building an IQueryable Provider](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=112370) on MSDN Blogs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Linq.IQueryable CreateQuery(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression expression) cil managed

param.name: expression
param.span: An expression tree that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

span.span: An expression tree that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

summary.span: Constructs an object that can evaluate the query represented by a specified expression tree.

span.span: Constructs an object that can evaluate the query represented by a specified expression tree.

returns.span: An that can evaluate the query represented by the specified expression tree.

span.span: An that can evaluate the query represented by the specified expression tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > Il proprietà dell'oggetto restituito è uguale all'oggetto `expression`.The property of the returned object is equal to `expression`. Il metodo viene utilizzato per creare nuovi oggetti, dato un albero delle espressioni.The method is used to create new objects, given an expression tree. La query rappresentata dall'oggetto restituito viene associata a uno specifico provider LINQ.The query that is represented by the returned object is associated with a specific LINQ provider. Molti dei metodi di operatore query standard definiti in , ad esempio e , chiamare questo metodo.Several of the standard query operator methods defined in , such as and , call this method. Passano un che rappresenta un [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.They pass it a that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

summary.span: Constructs an object that can evaluate the query represented by a specified expression tree.

span.span: Constructs an object that can evaluate the query represented by a specified expression tree.

returns.span: An that can evaluate the query represented by the specified expression tree.

span.span: An that can evaluate the query represented by the specified expression tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > Il proprietà dell'oggetto restituito è uguale all'oggetto `expression`.The property of the returned object is equal to `expression`. Il metodo viene utilizzato per creare nuovi oggetti, dato un albero delle espressioni.The method is used to create new objects, given an expression tree. La query rappresentata dall'oggetto restituito viene associata a uno specifico provider LINQ.The query that is represented by the returned object is associated with a specific LINQ provider. La maggior parte del metodi degli operatori query standard che restituiscono risultati enumerabili chiamano questo metodo.Most of the standard query operator methods that return enumerable results call this method. Passano un che rappresenta un [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.They pass it a that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Execute(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression expression) cil managed

param.name: expression
param.span: An expression tree that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

span.span: An expression tree that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

summary.span: Executes the query represented by a specified expression tree.

span.span: Executes the query represented by a specified expression tree.

returns.span: The value that results from executing the specified query.

span.span: The value that results from executing the specified query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il metodo esegue query che restituiscono un singolo valore (invece di una sequenza enumerabile di valori).The method executes queries that return a single value (instead of an enumerable sequence of values). Gli alberi delle espressioni che rappresentano le query che restituiscono risultati enumerabili vengono eseguite quando i relativi oggetto viene enumerato.Expression trees that represent queries that return enumerable results are executed when their associated object is enumerated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!TResult Execute<TResult>(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression expression) cil managed

typeparam.name: TResult
typeparam.span: Il tipo del valore risultante dall'esecuzione della query.

span.span: The type of the value that results from executing the query.

param.name: expression
param.span: An expression tree that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

span.span: An expression tree that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.

summary.span: Executes the strongly-typed query represented by a specified expression tree.

span.span: Executes the strongly-typed query represented by a specified expression tree.

returns.span: The value that results from executing the specified query.

span.span: The value that results from executing the specified query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il metodo esegue query che restituiscono un singolo valore (invece di una sequenza enumerabile di valori).The method executes queries that return a single value (instead of an enumerable sequence of values). Gli alberi delle espressioni che rappresentano le query che restituiscono risultati enumerabili vengono eseguite quando il oggetto che contiene l'albero delle espressioni viene enumerata.Expression trees that represent queries that return enumerable results are executed when the object that contains the expression tree is enumerated. Il metodi degli operatori query standard che restituiscono risultati singleton chiamano .The standard query operator methods that return singleton results call . Passano un che rappresenta un [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.They pass it a that represents a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query.
